response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premier product, which we believe could significantly enhance your business operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, we estimate its value to be well above $800,000. Considering this, I am extending an exclusive offer to you to acquire this product at a special price of $750,000. This offer is valid for a limited time only, and I encourage you to consider it carefully. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 750000}
